title: Active Directory
description:
## Active Directory

This dashboard monitors key Active Directory metrics for LDAP service, and replication inbound and outbound data sizes, objects, and properties

- [Active Directory Integration](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/active_directory/)


- [Troubleshoot Active Directory Performance](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/administration/performance-tuning/role/active-directory-server/troubleshoot)

You can clone this dashboard, copy and paste widgets from other out-of-the-box dashboards, and create your own visualizations for your custom applications.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of **Microsoft Active Directory (AD)** health and performance, designed to help you monitor domain controllers, replication, and authentication activity in real time.

It visualizes key performance counters collected from **Windows Serverâ€™s NTDS, Netlogon, Security System-Wide Statistics, DFS Replication,** and **DHCP** services. By tracking these metrics, you can quickly detect replication bottlenecks, authentication latency, service degradation, and capacity constraints before they impact users or applications.

Enable the Active Directory integration in your Datadog account to easily search, filter, and alert on all of these critical events in Datadog.

For configuration instructions, see:
[Active Directory Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/active_directory/)

To enable service checks, see the [Service checks](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/active-directory/#service-checks) section of the Active Directory docs.
For service states, see [Windows Service check states](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/windows-service/#service-checks):
- `OK`: Green
- `CRITICAL`: Red
- `UNKNOWN`: Gray
- `WARNING`: Yellow

definition.title: Search vs. Write operations performed by LDAP clients
